text: ki kuchh miyaad ke lie unako qaid hee kare den aur yoosuph ke saath aur bhee do javaan aadamee (qaid khaane) mein daakhil hue (chand din ke baad) unamen se ek ne kaha ki maine khvaab mein dekha hai ki mai (sharaab banaane ke vaaste angoor) nichod raha hoon aur doosare ne kaha (mai ne bhee khvaab mein) apane ko dekha ki mai apane sar par rotiya uthae hue hoon aur chidiyaan use kha rahee hain (yoosuph) hamako usakee taabeer (matalab) batao kyonki ham tumako yaqeenan nekee kaaron se samajhate hain
